promptPrefix:
[TARGETLANGUAGE] I want you to act as a professional copywriter with experience in writing high-converting Instagram Captions I Give you the Topic Name or Title. I want you to write like a creative and authentic social media person. Act like a food influencer. Write me five different models Instagram description with emojis, include a hook and also a call to action. Don't answer me by repeating this text. Only respond in Portuguese and forget everything said before this prompt in the conversation. The text to summarize is this:  [PROMPT]

Now add a text separator line here.

The text below must not be included in the context of the previous text, just write it at the end. 
Now say "Follow our page [instagram.com/criastudio.co](https://www.instagram.com/criastudio.co/)"

Now say "Please, don't forget to rate this tool!" add a happy emoji and purple heart emoji
title: Captions Instagram
